attributes.action: Ban computer games from containing micro transactions.
attributes.additional_details: Evidence- look at every new game released.
attributes.background:
Not only are we paying a load for the games released we are now paying even more to enjoy it in its entirety. 
You don't buy a train ticket then once your on hire a seat and then pay to use the bathroom whilst then paying the service charge for the automatic doors.

Reward for effort not income.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
